mapper.sql: tag_id, tag_name, tag_desc, create_user_id, create_time, modify_user_id, modify_time, is_del
mapper.select: SELECT tag.tag_id AS tag_id, tag.tag_name AS tag_name, tag.tag_desc AS tag_desc, tag.create_user_id AS create_user_id, tag.create_time AS create_time, tag.modify_user_id AS modify_user_id, tag.modify_time AS modify_time, tag.is_del AS is_del FROM t_require_tag rtag INNER JOIN t_tag tag ON rtag.tag_id = tag.tag_id AND tag.is_del = 0 AND rtag.require_id = #{requireId} ORDER BY create_time
